eventSchema.instructions: To add a new event, copy the template below and fill in all required fields

capacity.unit: Optional: 'teams' or leave empty for individuals

notes: - ID should be unique and URL-friendly (lowercase, hyphens for spaces)
- Status determines if event appears in upcoming or past section
- Tags should be short and descriptive
- Capacity unit is optional, defaults to 'individuals' if not specified
- For past events, you can replace capacity with attendance data
- Date.full is used for sorting events chronologically
